abstract: TerraForm raised about $500 million from the offering and $65 million from two additional private stock sales conducted at the I.P.O. price.
snippet: TerraForm raised about $500 million from the offering and $65 million from two additional private stock sales conducted at the I.P.O. price.
lead_paragraph: TerraForm Power, an arm of the solar power company SunEdison that operates over 200 solar power projects in the Americas, said on Thursday that it had priced its initial public offering at $25 a share, the top end of an already raised price range.

headline.main: TerraForm Power, Operator of Solar Plants, Prices I.P.O. at Top of Range

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
